text:
[Verse]
Golden hour falls
Sky is painted pink
We chase the light
No time to think

[Verse 2]
City streets glow
Neon nights ahead
Footsteps in sync
Words left unsaid

[Chorus]
Chasing sunsets
Running free
Every moment
You and me

[Verse 3]
Stars begin to peek
Darkness starts to play
Hands in the air
We dance and sway

[Bridge]
Hearts are racing
Feel that beat
Bass is thumping
In the heat

[Chorus]
Chasing sunsets
Running free
Every moment
You and me
title: Chasing Sunsets
